full_summary:
Infrastructures Services for Armoured Combat Vehicles
===============================================

Contract Information
-------------------

* Contract Title: Design-Builder Services for Armoured Combat Vehicles
* Contract Reference Number: MX-43070895273
* Solicitation Number: WO20210676751
* Publication Date: March 21, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 3, 2024, 2 PM EST

Background
----------

The Government of Canada is seeking a contractor to design and build infrastructure for the Armoured Combat Support Vehicle (ACSV) project. The project involves constructing a facility for the maintenance and storage of ACSV vehicles at the 2nd Canadian Division Support Base (CDSB) Valcartier.

Contract Requirements
---------------------

The contract will require the design-builder to:

* Develop a concept, design, and construct a 9,602m2 facility for the ACSV vehicles
* Provide associated ancillary site works and utilities

Security Clearance Requirements
-----------------------------

To be eligible for the contract, the design-builder must:

* Hold a valid and active Designated Organisation Screening (DOS) clearance
* Be sponsored by Defence Construction Canada (DCC) through its Industrial Security Program (ISP)

Sponsorship Process
-------------------

DCC will provide preliminary assistance with the security clearance sponsorship process. Interested Design-Builders should submit a sponsorship request application to DCC, which will review and communicate the requirements to the Design-Builder.

Important Dates
---------------

* Anticipated contract award date: Spring 2024, conditional on approval from the Department of National Defence (DND)
* Tender closing date: May 3, 2024, 2 PM EST

Contact Information
-------------------

* Jean Bergeron, Coordinator, Professional Services Contracts, Defence Construction Canada
* Phone: 418-932-7092
* Email: Jean.Bergeron@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

Disclaimer
----------

DCC does not guarantee that a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application forwarded by DCC will be successful or result in the granting of the requested security clearance(s) in a timely fashion. The processing of a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application is subject to the respective terms, conditions, and timelines of DCC's ISP sponsorship process and the CSP's security clearance granting process. By applying, the Design-Builder accepts and agrees to bear any risks associated with their application.

Note: The above rewritten entry does not include all the details present in the original contractor submission. The focus is
